metadata.Title: CVE-2023-43787 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in libX11 due to an integer overflow within the XCreateImage() function. This flaw allows a local user to trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> issue is in libx11, but libxpm was also fixed to avoid passing invalid data

criterions.comment: libx11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libxpm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
motif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
